amendment.description: To allow Indian tribes to use certain funds to construct housing for certain skilled workers.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3909 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3909 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Barrasso to Amendment SA 3896. (consideration: CR S2814-2815; text: CR S2814) To allow Indian tribes to use certain funds to construct housing for certain skilled workers.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3909 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3909 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Barrasso to Amendment SA 3896.
